verses.content: Chun, Isu khâwlai hmuna manih a ṭawngṭai a, a ṭawngṭai zo chun a închûktir mi pakhatin a kuomah, “Lalpa, ṭawngṭai dân Johanin a închûktirhai ân chûktir ang khan mîn chûktir ve ta la,” a ta.
Chun, ama chun an kuomah, “In ṭawngṭai chun hieng ang hin ti ro, ‘Kan Pa, I hming inzaum raw se. I ram hung tlung raw se,
Ni tin kan fâk khawpin bu mi pe la,
Kan suolhai mi ngaidam la, Keini khawmin kan iengkhat battuhai po po kan ngaidam hlak a nih. Thlêmnaa chun mi ṭhuoi lût naw rawh,’ tiin,” a ta.
Chun, ama bawkin an kuomah, “Nangni laia tûin amanih ruol nei sienla, zânrilah a kuomah fein, ‘Ruola, beiphêk pathum mîn pûktir rawh;
ka ruolpa inzinin a mi hung sir a, ama infâktir ding iengkhawm ka nei si nawh,’ ti sienla,
in sûnga mîn, ‘Mi sukbuoi naw, tuhin chu kawt khâr a ni tah a, ka nauhai khawm ka kuomah khumah an zâl tah a, thoin ka va pêk thei naw che,’ tiin dawn sienla.
Ka ti cheu hi, a ruolpa a ni leiin thoin a va pêk nawa chu, a hni tlut tlut leiin, a dit zât zât va pêng a tih.
“Chuongchun, ka ti cheu hi, hni ro, chuongchun, pêkin um in tih; zawng ro, chuongchun, hmûng in tih; nawk ro, chuongchun, hawngpêkin um in tih.
Tûkhawm a hni taphawt chun an hmu hlak; tûkhawm a zawng chun an hmu hlak, tûkhawm a nawk chu hawngpêk ning an tih.
Nangni laia pa hi, a naupain beiphêk hni sienla, tûin am lung pêng a ta? anleh, nga hni sienla, tûin am nga aiah rûl pêng a ta?
Anleh, ârtui hni sienla, ainuvêt a pêk ding am a nih?
Chuongchun, nangni mi suol hmanin in nauhai thil ṭha pêk na- châng in hriet chun, in Pa vâna mi chun a hnituhai chu Thlarau Inthieng a va pêk âwm ngei deh e!” a ta.
Chun, Isûn khawhri ṭawngthei- naw pakhat a hnawt dawk a. Chun, khawhri chu a suok phingleh ṭawngtheinaw chu a ṭawng tah a; chuongchun, mipuihaiin mak an ti hleh a.
Nisienlakhawm, a ṭhen chun, “Khawhri lal Beelzebub leiin annâwm khawhrihai a hnawt dawk hlak chu,” an ta.
Chun, a ṭhenin ama fiena dingin vâna inthawkin inchikna an hnih a.
Ama ruok chun, an ngaituohai chu a lo hriet a, an kuomah, “Khâwlai ram khawm mâni le mâni indo taphawt chu an bohmang hlak; sûng khat khawm mâni le mâni indo chu an bohmang hlak.
Setan khawm ama le ama ân do chun, a ram iengtin am ngîr suok a ta?
Chun, kei Beelzebub leia khawhrihai hnawt dawk hlak ka lo ni chun, in nauhaiin tû leiin am an hnawt dawk hlak a le? Chuleiin, anni chu nangni ngaituotu dinghai nîng an tih.
Amiruokchu, kei Pathien kut pâr leia khawhrihai hnawt dawk hlak ka ni chun, Pathien ram in kuomah a hung tlung tah nîng a tih.
“Mi hrât chun hriem famkim chawia a in a vêng sûng po, a sum chu himtakin a um zing hlak;
nisienlakhawm, ama nêka hrât lemin a hung thawh a, a hne pha chun, ân ringna râlthuom famkim chu a lâkpêk a, a râllâk thil chu a sem dar hlak.
Tûkhawm, keia tienga ṭhang naw chu a mi do a nih; tûkhawm a mi lâk khâwmpui naw chun, a the dar a nih.
“Khawhri inthieng naw chu mi sûnga inthawka a suokin, châwlna zawngin tui um nawna hmunahai ân vâk a. Châwlna hrim hrim a hmu nawh a, ‘Ka suokna ina khan kîr nâwk el ka tih,’ a ta,
chun, a va tlung chun phît faia cheimawiin a va hmuh a.
Chu phingleh a feh a, ama nêka suol lem khawhri dang pasari a hung ṭhuoi a, chutaka chun an lût a, an um zing hlak a; chu mihriem umzie nuhnung chu a hmasa nêkin a hung ṭha naw lem hlak a nih,” a ta.
Chun, chuong thu chu a hril laiin, mipui laia nuhmei pakhat a khêk suok a, a kuomah, “Nangma vawnna phîng chu a hamṭha ie, i nêne nêk khawm,” a ta.
Ama ruok chun, “Anih, nisien- lakhawm, Pathien thu hrea zâwmhai hi mi hamṭha an ni lem,” a ta.

Chun, mipuihai chu a kuoma an hung inkhâwm laiin Isûn, “Tulai ruoltharhai hi ruolthar suoltak an nih; inchikna an zawng a; nisien- lakhawm, Jona inchikna chau naw chu an kuomah inchikna hrim hrim pêk ni naw ni.
Jona chu Ninevi khuoa mihai ta dinga inchikna a lo ni ang khan, Mihriem Naupa khawm tulai ruoltharhai ta ding hin inchikna la nîng a tih.

“Simtieng lalnu kha ngaituo pha chun tulai ruoltharhai kuoma hin tho vêng a ta., thiemnaw inchangtir a tih; Solomon var ngai ding hmanin kâwlkawdawnga in- thawkin a hung sih a; ngai ta u, Solomon nêka ropui lem hitaka hin a um.

“Ninevi khuoa mihai chu ngaituo pha chun tulai ruoltharhai lai hin ngîr vêng an ta, thiemnaw inchangtir an tih, Jona thu hril leiin an sim sih a; ngai ta u, Jona nêka ropui lem hitaka hin a um annâwm.
“Tukhawmin khâwnvar an sitin in hnuoi kilah an sie ngai nawh, leikhâwr hnuoiah an sie ngai bawk nawh, mi lûthai chun a var an hmu theina dingin a sienaa chun an sie lem hlak a nih.
“I taksa khâwnvar chu i mit a nih, i mit a var chun i taksa khawm apumin a var suok hlak; a se ruok chun i taksa khawm ân thim zo vawng hlak.
Chuongchun, i sûnga var um chu inthim a lo ni el râwm, fîmkhur rawh.
Chuongchun, i taksa hi khâwlai khawm inthim loa a puma a var suok chun, khâwnvar var nasatakin a el che angin var suok a tih,” a ta.
Chun, a hril laiin, Pharisai pakhatin ama chu a kuoma bu fa dingin a fiel a; chuongchun, a lût a, buthlêng chu a awt a.
Chun, Pharisai chun bu fâk hmaa a kut a sâwp naw chu a hmuin mak a ti hleh a.
Chun, Lalpa chun a kuomah, “Nangni Pharisaihaiin no le thlêng puo tieng chu in sâwp fai hlak luoh a; in sûng tieng ruok chu hlêprûkna le suolin a sip sih a.
Mi invêthai, a puo tieng siemtu chun a sûng tieng khawm a siem naw am a nih?
Nisienlakhawm, a sûnga thil um chu mi rimsihai kuoma pêk dingin hmang ro; chuongchun, ngai ro, in ta dingin iengkim ân thieng tah a nih.

“Nangni Pharisaihai, in chung a rik ie! Pudina dâm, pardi dâm, thlai tinrêng dâm sâwma pakhat in pêk hlak a, felna le Pathien hmangaina chu in ngaitha hlak sih a. Nisienlakhawm, chuong chu a nih in sawnnaw in thaw ding chu, a danghai chu thaw ṭhul chuong loin.
Nangni Pharisaihai in chung a rik ie! Inkhâwmna ina ṭhungpha ṭhatak le dâwrhmuna chibai bûkhai in ngaina si hlak a.
In chung a rik ie! Thlân ti inhriet lo, a chunga hre loa mi an fe hlakna ang chu in nih,” a ta.
Chun, Dânhretu pakhatin a kuomah, “Inchûktirtu, hieng thu i hril hi keini khawm mi hal i ni hi,” a ta, a dawn a.
Ama chun, “Dân hretuhai, nangni khawm in chung a rik ie! Thil phur rinumtakhai mihai in bel hlak a, nangni chun phurhai chu in kutpâr pakhat khawmin in them ngai si nawh.
In chung a rik ie! Zâwlneihai thlân inhai in bâwl hlak a, in thlatuhai ithat an ni sih a.
Chuongchun, in thlatuhai thil- thawhai chu in hrietpuiin in remtipui a nih; annîn an that a, nangnîn an thlân inhai in bâwl sih a.
Chuleiin, Pathien varna khawmin, ‘An kuomah zâwlneihai le tirkohai tir ka ta, a ṭhen that an ta, a ṭhen suknawmnâng an tih;
zâwlnei po po thisen, leilung insieng tîra inthawka kha tulai ruoltharhai chunga phuba lâk a ni theina dingin.
Abel thisen suoka inthawk, Zakaria mâichâm le biekin inkâra thi, thisen suok chena mi kha.’ Anih, ka hril cheu hi, tulai ruoltharhai chunga hin phuba lâng an tih.
Nangni Dân hretuhai, in chung a rik ie! Varna chabi chu in fe hmangpui a; nangni hlak in lût nuom si nawh a, mi lût ding hlak in khap sih a,” a ta.
Chun, chutaka inthawka a suok chun, Dân inchûktirtuhai le Pharisaihai chun an tai ta rân a, thu tinrêng an inhriltir a;
a ṭawng suol hlaua man tumin an inchân zing a.
